title: Understanding of Flirting (English, Acera the Great)
description: They say there's no friends between men and women... Hojun and Yooha were close friends, and did not see each other as a man and woman. However, the day before Hojun's enlistment, Yooha suddenly kissed him. 'We're not lovers, but we've been dating. How can you say it's nothing?!'
author: Kim Tan-tan
